response.original_title: ゲーメスト ビデオ VOL.4 サムライスピリッツ
response.overview: Gamest Vol.4 Samurai Shodown  Color / 120 min / Stereo / September 25, 1993  Shinseisha GV-004  PIERCE TO STING!  I've been wanting to see this!!  Ikki Tousen! ~The Legend of the Shishi~  Haohmaru, Shiranui Genan, Earthquake, Hattori Hanzo, Nakoruru, Senryo Kyoshiro  Yagyu Jubei, Charlotte, Tachibana Ukyo, Ohko, Galford, Tamtam  Amakusa Shiro Tokisada  Samurai Soul Chronicle (1) Shura Road Arc (Haohmaru ~ Shiranui Genan ~ Earthquake)  One Strike! ~The Legend of the Deadly Swordsmanship~  Samurai Soul Chronicle (2) Ninja World Runaway Arc (Hattori Hanzo ~ Nakoruru ~ Senryo Kyoshiro)  Furious Fight! ~A Picture of Ashura Hell~  Samurai Soul Chronicles (3) Bushido Edition (Jubei Yagyu, Charlotte, Ukyo Tachibana)  A Momentary Foresight! ~Catching the Blade with a Real Sword~  Samurai Soul Chronicles (4) Saiun Gyōkyō Edition (Ouko, Galford, Tamtam)  Fight! ~The Explosive Legend of the Heroes~  Narration: Masaki Sawaya
response.title: GAMEST VIDEO VOL.4 -SAMURAI SPIRITS
